topic.title: Linux install
topic.body:
[21:07:40] FileServer Trying to open port using UpnpPunch...
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/gevent/threadpool.py", line 203, in _worker
    value = func(_args, *_kwargs)
herror: [Errno 4] No address associated with name
(<ThreadPool at 0x7fb0e87c4910 0/7/10>, <built-in function gethostbyname_ex>) failed with herror

AT A HOTEL... PLAY WITH WHEN I GET HOME. XD
If I remember... :/

1604065121_mirrored_nagromlt_github.body:
hah
thx for reminding me :D
I was at a huge Health IT conference so I was pretty busy.
Did not follow that... don't remember what I followed.  I'm sure I linked off of Slashdot or a crypto blog.

uname -a:    4.2.0-30-generic #36-Ubuntu SMP  x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

direct e-mail to you, I didn't go thru git.

On 03/04/2016 06:31 AM, Will wrote:

Distro info would be good.

At the least "uname -a".

You did follow this, yes?

https://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/using_zeronet/installing/#linux

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHubhttps://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/309#issuecomment-192303127.

?

On 04/14/2017 02:32 PM, Frederic Guilbault wrote:

Looks like a router/network issue, have you tried on a different network ?
